comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Robert Adamson (1871-1935), American journalist; in 1914 he was campaign manager for John Purroy Mitchell, and was appointed Fire Commissioner of the City of New York: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Adamson_%28FDNY_Commissioner%29 Joseph Johnson Jr was Adamson's predecessor at Fire Commissioner: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_Johnson_%28FDNY_Commissioner%29

comment._content: That photo must have been taken nearly at the same time as the one above.  Notice the identical cigar in an identical position on the desktop.
